system.description:
Time: 15−RSI seconds+Ritual: Chant
Range: RML Feet+Duration: 1 (MS); 3 (CS) hours

Permits the priest to command one Gulmorvrus within Range for Duration.

CS: The cleric has telepathic control and needs only to think of a command.

MS: The cleric must use verbal commands to direct the Gulmorvrus.

CF: Gulmorvrus engages and attacks the nearest person, who might be the invoking cleric.
